text.style: text-transform: none; font-family: "Inter Tight"; letter-spacing: -1px; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; white-space: pre; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: none; direction: ltr; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1;
